title: Clinical Mumbai Indians cruise to 48-run win over Kings XI Punjab
content: Four-time champions Mumbai Indians (MI) on Thursday cruised to a 48-run win over Kings XI Punjab at the Sheikh Zayed Stadium here. Chasing MI's total of 191/4 wickets in 20 overs, KXIP only managed to reach 143/8 wickets in 20 overs...

title: 5 Affordable Laptops That Are Great for Working From Home
content: The ongoing pandemic has pushed nearly all of us to work from our homes to ensure our as well as the safety of our loved ones. These are some of the finest affordable laptops you can buy with 10th generation Intel Core i3....

title: baked shrimp with feta with grilled sourdough
content: The yummiest Baked Shrimp with Feta and Grilled Sourdough! Bubble up some feta, garlic, shrimp, and tomato sauce in a pan, grill some buttery crispy bread, and dunk that right on in. The simplest fancy-ish dinner!
